summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding closing the 'Epstein Threat case'. The sender asks for confirmation to close the case, noting that all results and information regarding phone numbers and email addresses have been added to the case file.

persons.name: I=S
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email inquiring about closing the Epstein Threat case.

connections.description: Email correspondence regarding case management, indicating they work together on the Epstein Threat case.

events.title: Request to Close Epstein Threat Case
events.description: An FBI agent requests confirmation to close the 'Epstein Threat case', noting that all investigative results regarding phone numbers and email addresses have been added to the case file.

keyFacts: The FBI had an open 'Epstein Threat case' as of June 2020.
The case involved investigation of phone numbers and email addresses.
An FBI agent was seeking approval to close the case after adding all results to the file.
The correspondence indicates ongoing FBI administrative activity related to Epstein even after his death.
